description: True to its origins and its status as a trail legend, this lightweight version provides even more powerful grip and faster mud evacuation. Offering the comfort that Speedcross is known for, this model benefits from a waterproof and breathable Gore-Tex membrane, ideal for wet and muddy conditions, and an updated upper.
name: Salomon Speedcross 6 GTX - Mens

specs.value: Energycell™+ is a High Rebound Material Used in the Midsole. It Offers Exceptional Energy Return Coupled With Remarkable Cushioning and Resistance
Gore-tex® Keeps Your Feet Dry Inside and Out
Recycled Materials From Recycled Products, Such as Pet Bottles or Waste Materials
